column5: Awesome video (again) You do good work; they videos make for good watching.My favorite part was the dog or the scenery though. For me it was seeing the Rod bending every time you set the hook. I cant wait to see that in person soon.
Thanks , yup, scenery for me too, of course a few walleye help to pass the time, but company and scenery is where its at walking the shore!
Good deal SimonIt didn't rain north of you that day but the catching was excellent.Can't beat a good feed of walleyes and the scenery of NWO, I've been blessed to be up all this week
You got a mixed bag of weather eh? At least it's warm, hope the fishing was as good as the scenery for ya.
Hi all, walking the shore in the rain with a pale of minnows, a rod, and a best friend can't be beat! Gotta LOVE Northwest Ontario! http://youtu.be/pkMwijgPx1E
Thats just beautiful man. Thanks for sharing.
Love that you take your buddy with you. How good can it get!Frank
Yep. Me and my best friend were out Bear Narrows way all day in the rain today. My sweat pants were so heavy I had a hard time keeping them up.
I always enjoy being on a river. NICE; thanks for sharing.
Great video.My English Cocker/Spaniel loves fishing.Bill
LOL i usually just take my sweats off when that happens.
Thanks for the videos you post, I always enjoy them. Subscribed to your you tube so I can watch them more frequently.
